subtitle: An easy weekday meal but good enough for entertaining.

method.text: Toss the pork in the seasoned flour.
Melt the butter in a pan. Add the onions and cook for 2-3 min until softened. Add the pork and cook for 5 min, stirring frequently or until browned. Transfer to an ovenproof casserole dish.
Scatter over the apple slices. Pour over the stock and sprinkle over the herbs.
Cover and cook in the oven for 60 min. Season to taste. Serve on warmed serving plates.

title: Pork and apple casserole
